content: {"name":"learn_bash_from_session_data","description":"npm package that parses Claude Code session JSONL files, extracts bash commands, generates self-contained HTML learning resource with command breakdowns, categorized lessons, and interactive quizzes","architecture":"Python analysis scripts wrapped in Node.js CLI","components":["CLI (Node.js)","extractor.py","parser.py","analyzer.py","quiz_generator.py","html_generator.py","knowledge_base.py"],"output":"self-contained HTML","tabs":["Overview","Commands","Lessons","Quiz"],"no_external_deps":true}
